alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 2:36AM EST until January 22 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Ocean Effect Snow Showers. Additional snow accumulations of one half to two inches, except very localized 3-4 inch amounts possible across a small portion of eastern Plymouth county. * WHERE...Barnstable MA and Eastern Plymouth MA Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of ocean effect snow showers will be most numerous this morning. The activity will gradually diminish in areal coverage and intensity this afternoon. Snow accumulations will vary considerably over short distances given the heavier bands of snow will fall in narrow bands.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
